attributes.action: Put Fencing on the GCSE PE Syllabus as a sport option.
attributes.additional_details: Put Fencing on the GCSE PE Syllabus as a sport option.The current GCSE PE syllabus does not allow Fencing as a sport option either individually or as a team. It is discriminatory and grossly unfair on the thousands of fencers who spend 15 hours or more each week training and can not use their chosen sport for a GCSE option.
attributes.background: Fencing is multiple sport, healthy,fun, it is for all ages from 6 . Teach respect, friendship, win and lose, make good fitness and strong souls!
